titles.title: Election Day Registration Act
A bill to amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to require States to provide for election day registration.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3712-3713)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
5/1/2008--Introduced.
Election Day Registration Act - Amends the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to require each state with voter registration requirements relating to federal elections to permit any eligible individual on the day of a federal election to register to vote, and cast a vote, in such election.
